title: Adc looking for sup main (Kinda long text)
body:
Hey guys.

It is kinda a wierd request tbh. I am looking for a dia sup that is willig to smurf in silver with me. I used to be plat but i never played a fix role ( maybe mid and jungle though) i want to improve as an adc and i cant do that alone. 
The thing is im kinda rusty i haven't played that much over the last years cause i was busy with my studies.

Quick information about myself. I am 25 yrs old live in austria and can speak german an obv english.
Usually im funny ( at least my mom says that)  i do not rage to old for that, however i do try to win every game

If you wanna know more add me ingame: DixAut {{champion:119}}
